text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Board of Directors of the Corporation.
"Corporation" means the Maryland Technology Development Corporation.
"Improve" means to add, alter, construct, equip, expand, extend, improve, install, reconstruct, rehabilitate, remodel, or repair.
"Improvement" means addition, alteration, construction, equipping, expansion, extension, improvement, installation, reconstruction, rehabilitation, remodeling, or repair.
